snippet.title: Postal III: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The ridiculously over-the-top game series that pushed the envelope of video game violence returns in Postal 3. In true Postal fashion, follow a variety of racy career paths, including a serial killer, an activist gone eco-terrorist, or even a presidential candidate.

Shoot your way over to IGN for more Postal info:
http://pc.ign.com/objects/746/746545.html
